name: get_all_channel_infos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gwyo_twitch.
Tool description: This API gives access to informations about a User / Channel, and Streams on Twitch.
API description: Fetches the channel information for a given Twitch user by their username or ID.

userid.description: The username or ID of the Twitch user whose channel information is to be retrieved.
